name: Bacon Avocado Caesar Salad Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: romaine lettuce, bacon, avocado, crouton, parmesan cheese, caesar dressing
recipeIngredient: ½ cup shaved parmesan cheese, plus extra for serving
recipeInstructionSteps: Slice the lettuce into about 1-inch (2 ½ cm) pieces, then transfer to a large salad bowl.
Add the bacon, avocado, croutons, cheese, and dressing, mixing until evenly combined.
Serve with additional parmesan on top.
